catalogList.noResults: Sorry, we couldn’t find any results
catalogList.title: Select account to link

connectExternalPageScreen.failedBody: Unable to establish connection with your {{integrationName}}. Please check your address and networkIds are correct and try again.

deFiWalletDeclinedConnectionPage.connectionDeclinedBody: You have declined the request to connect your wallet, or a previous request is still active.
deFiWalletDeclinedConnectionPage.networkDeclinedBody: You have declined the request to change networks in your wallet.

defiWalletQrPage.declinedBody: You have declined the request to connect your wallet, or a previous request is still active.

defiWalletSelectNetworkPage.declinedBody: You have declined the request to change networks in your wallet.

defiWalletUnavaialbleConnectionPage.body: {{integrationName}} is not installed on this device. Please install the {{integrationName}} app, or connect another wallet.
defiWalletUnavaialbleConnectionPage.title: Connection unavailable

errorPage.sessionInfo: If you have questions, please report this with session ID {{sessionId}}.
errorPage.title: An error has occurred.

ineligibleReason.amountBelowMinimumDescription: The requested transfer amount of {{requestedAmount}} is less than {{integrationName}}’s minimum of {{minimumAmount}} to transfer on the {{network}} network.
ineligibleReason.balanceBelowMinimumDescription: Your {{currentBalance}} balance is less than {{integrationName}}’s {{minimumAmount}} minimum to transfer on the {{network}} network.
ineligibleReason.belowRequestedAmountDescription: Your {{balance}} balance is less than the {{amount}} required to cover the requested transfer amount + fees.
ineligibleReason.gasFeeAssetBalanceNotEnoughDescription: Your {{balance}} balance is insufficient to cover the estimated {{gasFee}} gas fee on the {{network}} network.
ineligibleReason.insufficientBalanceDescription: Your {{currentBalance}} balance is less than the the minimum for this transfer.
ineligibleReason.notEligibleDescription: {{clientName}} does not accept {{symbol}}, or no {{network}} address was provided for this transfer.
ineligibleReason.symbolDoesNotMatchDescription: {{clientName}} does not accept {{symbol}}, or no {{symbol}} address was provided for this transfer.

mfaHint.phone: Check your phone for an SMS message

previewTransfer.transferDeclinedBody: You have declined the transfer request in your wallet.

verifyErrorPage.body: You have declined the signature request in your wallet, or a previous request is still active. {{clientName}} cannot verify ownership of your wallet without a signature.
verifyErrorPage.title: Verification declined
